directions: Stir pumpkin pie filling, cream cheese, 1 cup whipped topping, and confectioners' sugar together in a large bowl until smooth; spread into the prepared pie crust. Top pie with remaining whipped topping.
Refrigerate pie until the filling is set, 4 to 6 hours.
ingredients: 2 cups frozen whipped topping, thawed and divided
title: No-Bake Pumpkin Cheesecake Pie
